title: Lag Spikes
body: Recently I have had issues with random lag spikes. Since the server move my ping has been lower (around 45), but mid-game I see it jump between 400 and 1500. Friends also have been experiencing the same problem. I feel as if it isn't  my router and/or internet service for that reason. Anyone find a fix?

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/VoG02Eh1-8212015-8222015-lag-spiking-up-to-500?show=flat&page=5 

Issue has been being discussed for a month in this thread^

Hi Pyromite!

I just did some traces from inside of our network back to you and everything looks like it's routing correctly (from our Chicago POP to our Atlanta POP and then finally to comcast).  Can you provide a traceroute towards 104.160.131.3?

Thanks!
Will you guys be updating the Chicago Update Tool Clinic megathread anytime soon?

I've also been having problems with random lag/dcs, as are many others by looking at the help and support page. As you are the only rioter that I can find actually responding to this issue, do you have any advice on the best way to figure out what's going on?

Before the move I almost never lagged and now my ping keeps spiking and stay in the thousands for a lot of the game. This is very upsetting and due to this I want to quite playing league since i cant go a game without lagging. What makes the matter even more upsetting is I've spent hundreds on dollars on league already.
Me and my friends have been having issues with random lag spikes as well. I'll have 60 ping and then every couple minutes there will be a few seconds of me not being able to move.
